Our projects

Our projects are designed to be pleasant and get as much comfort as possible for average or experienced travellers. Our spaces are perfect for meetings, teamwork, recreation and tourism. In our places you will find it convenient to work, meet new people, and spend your time with pleasure.

Venture Fund projects

A developer company which is a home of all our legal technologies. We have a big experience in legal market products and services. Our team is a group of professionals who are making legal services more advanced and simpler for all.
A company and CPA & CPL platform for independent lawyers and lawyer companies. We want to give new opportunities to get a new level of law services to you and our clients.
CPA & CPL platform for webmasters and marketing advertisers. Our services is to giving work for legal market and unite the supply and demand.
Legal tech CPL tool for simple and proper management in law service market. Law CRM is a great tool managing relationships between customers and lawyers much more easier.
